article_title: Police investigating shooting at Bonanza Road
article_text:
Las Vegas police investigated an east valley shooting Sunday night.

Few details were available, but officers responded to Bonanza Road near Eastern Avenue just after 7:30 p.m.

One person was taken to University Medical Center. Police didn’t know his condition.

Detectives were investigating the scene.

Contact reporter Annalise Little at alittle@reviewjournal.com or 702-383-0391. Find her on Twitter: @annalisemlittle.
